运行：按钮 / *Cmd+Shift+Enter*.

```{r}
plot(cars)
```

插入一行代码块：按钮 / *Cmd+Option+I*.

## matrix() 新建一个矩阵

```{r}
vector <- c(1, 2, 3, 4) 
nameRow = c("row1", "row2")
nameCol = c("col1", "col2")
mymatrix <- matrix(vector, 2, 2, TRUE, dimnames = list(nameRow, nameCol))  # matrix(data, ncol, nrow, byrow);
print(mymatrix)
```

difference between `byrow = FALSE` and `byrow = TRUE`

-   `TRUE`: 1 3 2 4

-   `FALSE`: 1 2 3 4

### get value of a matrix

```{r}
mymatrix
mymatrix[2,2]
mymatrix[1,1:2]
```
